name: Lunar Lander (itch) (FraserGrandfield)
description:
Based of the 1979 Lunar Lander game.

The aim is to land the space ship and gain as many points as possible before your fuel reaches 0. The game allows the users to have multiple profiles, view high scores, unlock achievements and replay old play throughs.

Controls:

ESC: pause game.

A: rotate left.

D: rotate right.

: accelerate ship.
